numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that there are many players of color.
2. Each league has a different percentage of players of color.
3. I wonder why there are more players of color than coaches of color in these league teams.
5. This situation shows other people that they can join a league team.
6. Some people might not have the highest chance to join a league team.
7. If a person tries and the person is good then the person has a pretty good chance to join a league team.
